body.p: Work on machine translation is still in an initial phase. Cf. the internal plan/mt directory.

section.title: Transfer lexica
section.p: Transfer lexica for North Sámi -> Lule Sámi and North Sámi -> Norwegian Bokmål is under construction. The former is financed by a grant from the Norwegian Research Council. They can be found here: words/dicts/smesmj/src and words/dicts/smenob/src.

section.title: Plans
section.p: North Sámi - Lule Sámi are closely related languages, and thus constitute a natural start for work on machine translation.
